content.html:
when compiling sdformat 3.0 against gazebo_ros_pkgs, I started seeing errors below:

/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/c++0x_warning.h:32:2: error: #error This file requires compiler and library support for the ISO C++ 2011 standard. This support is currently experimental, and must be enabled with the -std=c++11 or -std=gnu++11 compiler options.
 #error This file requires compiler and library support for the \
  ^
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8/cstdint:35:0,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/Types.hh:23,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/Param.hh:36,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/sdf.hh:6,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/State.hh:26,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/ModelState.hh:30,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/Model.hh:32,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/Actor.hh:24,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/physics.hh:2,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/quadrotor/catkin_birdseye/src/gazebo_ros_pkgs/gazebo_plugins/include/gazebo_plugins/gazebo_ros_f3d.h:30,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/quadrotor/catkin_birdseye/src/gazebo_ros_pkgs/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_f3d.cpp:24:
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/c++0x_warning.h:32:2: error: #error This file requires compiler and library support for the ISO C++ 2011 standard. This support is currently experimental, and must be enabled with the -std=c++11 or -std=gnu++11 compiler options.
 #error This file requires compiler and library support for the \
  ^
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8/cstdint:35:0,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/Types.hh:23,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/Param.hh:36,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/quadrotor/catkin_birdseye/src/gazebo_ros_pkgs/gazebo_plugins/include/gazebo_plugins/gazebo_ros_block_laser.h:31,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/quadrotor/catkin_birdseye/src/gazebo_ros_pkgs/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_block_laser.cpp:26:
/usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/c++0x_warning.h:32:2: error: #error This file requires compiler and library support for the ISO C++ 2011 standard. This support is currently experimental, and must be enabled with the -std=c++11 or -std=gnu++11 compiler options.
 #error This file requires compiler and library support for the \
  ^
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8/cstdint:35:0,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/Types.hh:23,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/Param.hh:36,
                 from /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/sdf.hh:6,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/State.hh:26,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/ModelState.hh:30,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/Model.hh:32,

                 from /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_asme_2014/install_release/include/gazebo-6.0/gazebo/physics/physics.hh:2,
                 from /home/hsu/projects/quadrotor/catkin_birdseye/src/gazebo_ros_pkgs/gazebo_plugins/include/gazebo_plugins/gazebo_ros_hand_of_god.h:28,

patch below seems to "fix" it:

diff -r 6cf114b3d7a7 include/sdf/Types.hh
--- a/include/sdf/Types.hh  Wed Apr 08 14:15:01 2015 -0700
+++ b/include/sdf/Types.hh  Thu Apr 09 12:57:48 2015 -0700
@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@

 #include <algorithm>
 #include <cmath>
-#include <cstdint>
+// #include <cstdint>  /// needs c++11
 #include <sstream>
 #include <vector>
 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
